hadith.text: It was narrated from Mu'adh bin Abdur-Rahman At-Taimi that his father said:"we were with Talhah bin Ubaidullah and we were Ihram. A birth was given to him when he was asleep, and some of us at from it and others refrained. Talhah woke up and agreed with those who had eaten it, and said: 'We ate it with Messenger of Allah
